feature1.title: Ability Enhanced
feature1.description: Enhance your product design and UI design thinking

feature2.title: Publicity
feature2.description: You'll receive publicity for the work you complete

feature3.title: Friends
feature3.description: You will get to know like-minded friends.

feature4.title: Elimination Mechanism
feature4.description: If you fail to complete tasks or share results in a timely manner, you may be eliminated from the group

feature5.title: Yield Returns
feature5.description: Your investment can yield returns in both the open-source and commercial markets.

feature6.title: indie developer
feature6.description: Experience the directions many independent developers are exploring.
